version_description:
This update fixes a bug that was causing the app to crash when selecting an image from the photo library on iOS 10. 

Thanks for using Lomograph!

This update fixes a bug that was causing the app to crash when selecting an image from the photo library on iOS 10. 

Thanks for using Lomograph!

Whoa! The launch of Lomograph was a blast! Thank you very much for using Lomograph and suggesting it to your friends :)

In the new and very first update of Lomograph:

1) Presenting 7 new filters within 2 new filter collections: The Space Odyssey and The Pastel Pink Tones
2) New design of a date stamp
3) Now you can select a custom date for a date stamp and go back in time :)
4) Now you can turn off the distortion effect (sometimes it distorts image too much)
5) Removed some bugs, why we would need them anyway, am I right?

Update the app now and let us know what you think by leaving a review on App Store :)

Don't forget to use #lomographapp hashtag to get featured on our Instagram page!

Much love,

Lomograph

Whoa! The launch of Lomograph was a blast! Thank you very much for using Lomograph and suggesting it to your friends :)

In the new and very first update of Lomograph:

1) Presenting 7 new filters within 2 new filter collections: The Space Odyssey and The Pastel Pink Tones
2) New design of a date stamp
3) Now you can select a custom date for a date stamp and go back in time :)
4) Now you can turn off the distortion effect (sometimes it distorts image too much)
5) Removed some bugs, why we would need them anyway, am I right?

Update the app now and let us know what you think by leaving a review on App Store :)

Don't forget to use #lomographapp hashtag to get featured on our Instagram page!

Much love,

Lomograph

Hey there!

Just a quick update for the last update due to some people experiencing problems with purchasing some new filters.

Now the problem is gone and the filters are ready to be purchased :)

Love,
Lomograph developer

Dear Kim,
 
Thank you for using the app. In your honor, I made a new filter "Kim" for you (and all other users)

Enjoy.

Dear Kim,
 
Thank you for using the app. In your honor, I made a new filter "Kim" for you (and all other users)

Enjoy.

URGENT BUG FIX:

- Fixed a bug which would not open the purchased filters right away for some users. 

IMPORTANT: if you purchased filters from Space Odyssey Collection or Pastel Pink Collection and they didn't show up, just
tap on "restore purchase" button.

NEWS: New filters and updates are in development and will be launched this Summer!

Edit a photo in Lomograph and use our hashtag #lomographapp 
to get a chance to be featured on our Instagram page @lomographapp

Love,
Lomograph

Th biggest Lomographg update is here!

• 8 brand new filters
• 2 new filter collections - Scout Camp "Arterk" Collection & Nina's Gossips Collection
• Original filters were improved
• KIM filter was renamed to MALINA filter (sorry, Kim)
• Bug fix
• Fired Peter, he never was on time anyway

Thank you for all the love <3 
Enjoy the new filters!

Love,
Lomograph developer

Thanks for using Lomograph!

This update fixes a bug that was causing the app to crash when selecting an image from the photo library on iOS 10. 

Thanks for using Lomograph!

Thank you for updating to the latest version of Lomograph!

This update includes:
- Optimizations for the best quality photos with higher resolution. We simplified this step by removing the option to pick between the “Best” and “Original” image to download, so now every download is captured in the highest resolution.
- Easily share your beautiful photo edits across your social platforms with one tap
- Additional overall performance improvements & optimizations

Thank you for editing with Lomograph! Questions, issues or feedback? Drop us a line at contact@maplemedia.io and we’d be happy to help.

Thank you for updating to the latest version of Lomograph!

This update includes:
- Optimizations for the best quality photos with higher resolution. We simplified this step by removing the option to pick between the “Best” and “Original” image to download, so now every download is captured in the highest resolution.
- Easily share your beautiful photo edits across your social platforms with one tap
- Additional overall performance improvements & optimizations

Thank you for editing with Lomograph! Questions, issues or feedback? Drop us a line at contact@maplemedia.io and we’d be happy to help.

Thank you for updating to the latest version of Lomograph.

This update includes:

◊ Introducing premium filter previews: for the first time, try all of our 50+ exclusive filters on your photos before purchase so you can truly see how much it enhances the look.

◊ Squashed a bug that was causing some users’ app to crash in iOS 14; thanks to everyone who reported this issue.

◊ Default export quality is now even higher. Make sure “dust” is disabled in settings for an even crisper look.

◊ Improved social sharing: easily share your edits across social platforms with one tap.

◊ Plus overall performance improvements & optimizations to make sure you have the best photo-editing experience.

Thank you for editing with Lomograph, we appreciate your support! Questions, issues or feedback? Drop us a line at contact@maplemedia.io for fast and friendly support.
